entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy in onshore winds with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to a few flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
